WASP.en: WASP (WebAssembly Agent System Platform) is a platform to build autonomous agents in UOMI using Rust + WASM.
WASP.id: WASP (WebAssembly Agent System Platform) adalah platform untuk membuat agen otonom di UOMI menggunakan Rust + WASM.

UOMI.en: UOMI is a blockchain ecosystem supporting agents, smart contracts, testnet, and WASM deployment.
UOMI.id: UOMI adalah ekosistem blockchain yang mendukung agen, smart contract, testnet, dan deployment WASM.
